marklogic.body: I feel the show by itself is Always interesting...but I imagine the average fan having a closet full of supplements and I worry how they may interact with each other. Lets say one day it is all about Weight loss...then cardiac...then aging...wow the expense of staying alive. Let the food sources be more obtainable! A powdered form of a particular exotic fruit should be viewed suspiciously. We need to take on healthier choices obviously but lets keep it real...really can i just live better out of a capsule...not likely....and just avoid the obviously gamble of exposing some bizarre diets...ie. anything under 1500 calories...just starving the cells of needed nutrients in fruits and veggies.
